resources.string: create table if not exists unupbeacon (isour text,mac_id text,uuid text, rssi text, major text, minor text, building text, floor text, coord_x text , coord_y text, coverage text , power text , frequency text , temperaturefrequency text , lightfrequency text , type text , firm varchar(100) , create_id text , company_id text , accelerate text , create_time text , last_modify_id text , last_modify_time text, address text);
